name: Ball Adventure (vaibhavkr)
description:
Hey, welcome to Ball Adventure - a 2D Arcade Adventure Game Play as cute balls and uncover the adventure of this 2D Adventure World.

Features :

  • 6 Levels to Play
  • 4 Different Colored Balls with a Few Different Abilities
  • Colorful World
  • Both WASD (Without S) and Arrow Keys (Without Down Arrow Key) are Supported along with Space

CREDITS :

Game Developed by : Vaibhav Kumar
Assets by :
 1. Kenney - For Platform, Coin, and so much more
 2. athile and KIIRA - For Grass and Ground Textures
 3. Vaibhav Kumar - For Additional Assets
Audio by :
 1. Jan125 - For Main Music
 2. Philippe Groarke - For Spike Destroying Sound
 3. Zapsplat.com - For Additional Sounds

Thanks for Playing :)
